original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū nānappakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjanti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjissanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ nānappakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjissanti sā iyyathā api gihī kāma bhoginaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū nānappakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjissanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave nānā pakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ nānā pakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu nānappakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajjeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
sīsu upagam gīvu upagam hatthu upagam pādu upagam kaṭu upaga

original: satthuvaṇṇo kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, dārumāsako, jatumāsako ye vohāraṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: satthuvaṇṇaḥ kahāpaṇaḥ loha māsakaḥ dāru māsakaḥ jatu māsakaḥ ye vohāram gacchanti
a katena a katam nissaggiyam pācittiya
a katena kata a katam nissaggiyam pācittiya
kata a katena katam nissaggiyam pācittiya
kata akatena a katam nissaggiyam pācittiya
kata akatena kata akatam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
analyzed: tena bhikkhunā saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā vuḍḍhānam bhikkhūnam pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikam nisīditvā añjalim paggahetvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ
aha bhante nānā pakārakam rūpiya savohāram samāpajji

original: Sace tattha āgacchati ārāmiko vā upāsako vā so vattabbo—
analyzed: sace tattha āgacchati ārāmikaḥ vā upāsakaḥ vā saḥ vattabbo

original: sappi vā telaṁ vā madhu vā phāṇitaṁ vā.
analyzed: sappi vā telam vā madhu vā phāṇitam vā

original: Sace so tena parivattetvā kappiyaṁ āharati, rūpiyacetāpakaṁ ṭhapetvā, sabbeheva paribhuñjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace saḥ tena parivattetvā kappiyam āharati rūpiya cetāpakam ṭhapetvā sabbeha iva paribhuñjitabba
evañca itam labhetha id ca itam kusala
sace saḥ chaḍḍa iti idca itam kusala

original: no ce chaḍḍeti, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu rūpiyachaḍḍako sammannitabbo—
analyzed: no ce chaḍḍeti pañca haṅgehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu rūpiya chaḍḍako sammannitabbo

original: yo na chandāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṁ gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca jāneyya.
analyzed: yaḥ na chandāgatim gaccheyya na dosāgatim gaccheyya na mohāgatim gaccheyya na bhayāgatim gaccheyya chaḍḍita a chaḍḍitam ca jāneyya

original: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
analyzed: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅghaḥ ñāpetabbaḥ

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṁ sammanneyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhum rūpiya chaḍḍakam sammanneyya
saṅghaḥ itthannāmam bhikkhum rūpiya chaḍḍakam sammannati

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno rūpiya chaḍḍakassa sammuti saḥ tuṇhassa
sammataḥ saṅghena itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu rūpiya chaḍḍako

original: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā animittaṁ katvā pātetabbaṁ.
Sace nimittaṁ katvā pāteti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: sace nimittam katvā pāta iti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Rūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: rūpiye rūpiya saññī rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Rūpiye vematiko rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: rūpiye vematikaḥ rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: rūpiye arūpiya saññī rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: arūpiye rūpiya saññī rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Arūpiye vematiko rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: arūpiye vematikaḥ rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Arūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: arūpiye arūpiya saññī rūpiyam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
